before:
<!-- markdownlint-disable MD024 -->

# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

In order to avoid dev teams constantly switching to new versions and also have the ability to
enforce changes, [Custom Tagging Policy](./RELEASE-TAGGING.md) for releases is followed

> Make sure version in [Chart.yaml](k8s/helm/hbi-deployment/Chart.yaml) also updated.

---

## [Unreleased]

## 2.50.1 - 2023-04-26

### Changed

- Restrict Pod replicas to 1 per node ([PAAS-1738](https://hbidigital.atlassian.net/browse/PAAS-1738))
- Refactor to CI test stages, split jobs out into test matrix. ([PAAS-1783](https://hbidigital.atlassian.net/browse/PAAS-1783))

---

## 2.50.0 - 2023-04-26

### Added

- PodDisruptionBudget only when the number of replicas is greater than 2. The setting for PDB is `maxUnavailable=20%`. When the number is not an integer, it rounds up to the next integer, then when having 7 replicas, the maximum number that can be unavailable is 2. ([PAAS-1782](https://hbidigital.atlassian.net/browse/PAAS-1782)).

## 2.49.1 - 2023-04-10

### Changed

- Improve pipeline; extract snippets, build Docker image once.

### Added

- Duplicate `DD_SERVICE_NAME` warning message added.

---
after:
<!-- markdownlint-disable MD024 -->

# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

In order to avoid dev teams constantly switching to new versions and also have the ability to
enforce changes, [Custom Tagging Policy](./RELEASE-TAGGING.md) for releases is followed

> Make sure version in [Chart.yaml](k8s/helm/hbi-deployment/Chart.yaml) also updated.

---

## [Unreleased]

### Added
- Team namespaces, every service account should have a per-team AWS

---

## 2.50.1 - 2023-04-26

### Changed

- Restrict Pod replicas to 1 per node ([PAAS-1738](https://hbidigital.atlassian.net/browse/PAAS-1738))
- Refactor to CI test stages, split jobs out into test matrix. ([PAAS-1783](https://hbidigital.atlassian.net/browse/PAAS-1783))

---

## 2.50.0 - 2023-04-26

### Added

- PodDisruptionBudget only when the number of replicas is greater than 2. The setting for PDB is `maxUnavailable=20%`. When the number is not an integer, it rounds up to the next integer, then when having 7 replicas, the maximum number that can be unavailable is 2. ([PAAS-1782](https://hbidigital.atlassian.net/browse/PAAS-1782)).

## 2.49.1 - 2023-04-10

### Changed

- Improve pipeline; extract snippets, build Docker image once.

### Added

- Duplicate `DD_SERVICE_NAME` warning message added.

---
